g.text: Help Desk Services Manager
System
initiates the request to add/update tasks in a service draft
asks if the user pretends to use an existing draft
responds
alt
[if the user pretends to use an existing draft]
presents the draft list and asks the user to choose a draft
chooses a draft
alt
[if the user wants to add an approval task to the draft]
requests the user to insert the approval task's description
inserts the task's description
requests the user to insert the resolution task's description
inserts the resolution task's description and priority
requests the user to insert the resolution task's type
inserts the resolution task's type
alt
[if the user pretends to add a manual task]
requests the user to insert the form's name
inserts the form's name
loop
[until the user doesn't want to add more forms]
requests the user to insert the attribute's data (name, label, description, regex, scriptPath)
inserts the data
presents the available data types
selects the data types
asks if there is more attribute to add to the current form
responds
[if the user pretends to add an automatic task]
requests the user to insert the task's script's path
inserts the task's script's path
validates, presents the current
information in the draft and asks for confirmation
confirms
registers the draft in the persistence
and informs of the success of the operation
